title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day (1991)
explanation: This plot incorporates many elements of friendship and discovery, as the characters form bonds and uncover critical information about their enemy, with the sci-fi setting providing a unique backdrop for their journey. title: Aliens (1986)
explanation: This movie plot aligns exceptionally well with the user's preferences, as it is a heartfelt sci-fi tale about friendship (between Ripley and the survivors) and discovery (of the alien species and their origins). title: Interstellar (2014)
explanation: This plot aligns exceptionally well with the user's preferences, containing a heartfelt narrative about friendship and discovery, set against the backdrop of a challenging sci-fi scenario. title: Guardians of the Galaxy (2014)
